subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Ronaldinho and Kaká, midfielders for A.C. Milan, were selected for Brazil’s roster for World Cup qualifiers at Ecuador (March 26) and against Peru (April 1) despite injuries. Kaká injured a foot on Feb. 7 in a Serie A match against Reggina, and Ronaldinho has had lingering problems with an Achilles’ heel. brazil.
